resources.string: Enable WebView debugging and add vConsole in it. Support WebView, TBS X5, UC U4, Crosswalk(XWalk), XWeb.
Whether it is free support or paid donations, it is the biggest motivation for my developing.
Manage some loadable resources here, such as vConsole
Used to pull cloud rules, pull part of hooking resources, etc
GitHub is more recommended for global users.\nFastGit is more recommended for users in mainland China.\nOf course, you can use other custom data source.
1. Choose the version which most similar to the app in your device.\n2. Save all rules for the version (If you understand the role of each rule, you can save it as needed).
Auto check update or not when module launched.

AppCenter is an anonymous data collection solution from Microsoft. We use it to anonymously collect crash logs, performance indicators, interaction habits and other data during your use of this module.

For Chinese user:
	1. Alipay Red Packet is which you can get a free red packet and pay it to me every day.
	2. AliPay is recommended because it can pay with some red packets you got from Alipay just like #1(Scanning through the album may not work, it is recommended to scan through another screen).
	3. WeChat is not recommended because of its handling fee for me.

For global user:
	I do not support accepting donations for the time being due to the handling fee and other reasons.
